metadata.title: CanadaGPT - Government Accountability
metadata.description: Track Canadian MPs, bills, lobbying, and government spending with transparency and accountability.
metadata.keywords: Canada, government, accountability, MPs, bills, lobbying, transparency

footer.description: Making Canadian government data accessible and transparent through advanced AI and data analysis.
footer.openSource: Open source project dedicated to government transparency

hero.title: Government Accountability Made Transparent
hero.subtitle: Track MPs, bills, lobbying, and spending with powerful AI-driven insights

mp.title: MP Tracking
mp.description: Monitor all 338 Members of Parliament, their voting records, and accountability metrics

bills.title: Bill Monitoring
bills.description: Follow legislation through Parliament with real-time status updates and AI-powered summaries

lobbying.title: Lobbying Transparency
lobbying.description: Expose corporate influence with comprehensive lobbying activity tracking

spending.title: Expense Analysis
spending.description: Track government spending and MP expenses with detailed breakdowns and comparisons

cta.title: Ready to dive in?
cta.description: Explore Canadian parliamentary data like never before

bill.awaitingDescription: No votes have occurred yet. This bill is scheduled for second reading debate.
bill.privateMemberNote: As a Private Member's Bill, it is waiting in the Order of Precedence queue for its turn to be debated and voted on.

results.title: Search Results
results.tryDifferent: Try adjusting your search query or filters

tips.title: Search Tips
items: Use specific keywords for better results (e.g., "carbon pricing" vs "environment")
Try multiple related terms if you don't find what you're looking for
Use filters to narrow down by party, MP, or date range
Set minimum word count to find substantial speeches vs short remarks
Filter out procedural remarks to focus on policy discussions
Click on speaker names to see their full parliamentary profile

seating.title: House of Commons Seating
seating.instruction: Click any seat to view MP details. Hover to see names. Cabinet ministers have gold rings.

about.title: About This Dashboard
about.description: This dashboard provides real-time insights into Canadian federal government operations. Data is sourced from official government databases including Parliament, LEGISinfo, and the Office of the Commissioner of Lobbying. Expense data typically reflects information 2-3 months after quarter end.

spending.title: Government Spending
spending.subtitle: Track MP expenses and government expenditures

chat.placeholder: Ask about MPs, bills, or parliamentary data...
chat.error: Failed to get response. Please try again.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.description: Learn how CanadaGPT collects, uses, and protects your personal information

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: CanadaGPT ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our website and services at https://canadagpt.ca. By using CanadaGPT, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

account.title: 1.1 Account Information
account.content: When you create an account using OAuth authentication providers (Google, GitHub, Facebook, LinkedIn), we collect:

items.name: Your name (as provided by the OAuth provider)

items.posts: Forum posts and topics you create
items.comments: Comments and replies to forum discussions
items.votes: Upvotes and downvotes on forum content

items.pages: Pages you visit and features you use
items.ip: IP address and approximate geographic location

items.authentication: Authenticate your identity and manage your account
items.forum: Enable you to participate in forum discussions
items.personalization: Personalize your experience and remember your preferences
items.analytics: Analyze usage patterns to improve our services
items.communication: Send important updates about service changes or new features
items.security: Detect and prevent fraud, abuse, and security incidents

publicData.title: Public Parliamentary Data
publicData.content: CanadaGPT displays publicly available Canadian government data from official sources. This data is NOT collected by us and remains the property of the Government of Canada. Sources include:

sources.parliament: Parliament of Canada (openparliament.ca) - Hansard debates and speeches
sources.legisinfo: LEGISinfo - Bill tracking and legislative information
sources.lobbying: Office of the Commissioner of Lobbying - Lobbying registry and communications
sources.canlii: CanLII - Case law and legal documents (optional, user-initiated)

security.title: Data Storage and Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information:

items.auth: Authentication: Supabase (managed PostgreSQL with encryption at rest)
items.hosting: Hosting: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) with HTTPS/TLS encryption
items.database: Database: Neo4j graph database for parliamentary data (separate from user data)
items.encryption: All data transfers use TLS 1.2+ encryption

items.https: HTTPS-only access (enforced at CDN and application levels)
items.oauth: OAuth 2.0 authentication (no passwords stored by CanadaGPT)
items.isolation: User data isolated from public parliamentary data

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use the following third-party services that may collect information used to identify you:

oauth.name: OAuth Providers
oauth.description: Google, GitHub, Facebook, and LinkedIn for authentication

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights

access.title: Access
access.description: View your account information and forum posts

deletion.title: Deletion
deletion.description: Request account deletion (forum posts may be anonymized but retained for historical context)

export.title: Data Export
export.description: Request a copy of your personal data

optOut.title: Opt-Out
optOut.description: Withdraw consent for non-essential data processing

rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@canadagpt.ca

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for authentication and basic site functionality

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.description: Remember your language preference and UI settings

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Understand how visitors use our site (anonymized data only)

forumPosts.title: Forum Posts
forumPosts.description: Retained indefinitely for historical record; may be anonymized upon account deletion

logs.title: Server Logs
logs.description: Retained for 90 days for security and debugging purposes

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: CanadaGPT is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

international.title: International Users
international.content: Our services are hosted in Canada and the United States (Google Cloud Platform). By using CanadaGPT, you consent to the transfer of your information to Canada and the United States. We comply with applicable Canadian privacy laws (PIPEDA) and provide protections equivalent to GDPR and CCPA standards.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

laws.pipeda: Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA) - Canada
laws.gdpr: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) - European Union
laws.ccpa: California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) - United States
